dict.string: on alfred_script(q) if q is "fullscreen" then tell application "System Events" to key code 20 using {shift down, control down} else if q is "tall" then tell application "System Events" to key code 18 using {shift down, control down} else if q is "wide" then tell application "System Events" to key code 19 using {shift down, control down} else if q is "floating" then tell application "System Events" to key code 21 using {shift down, control down} else if q is "shrink" then tell application "System Events" to keystroke "h" using {shift down, option down, control down} else if q is "expand" then tell application "System Events" to keystroke "l" using {shift down, option down, control down} else if q is "increase" then tell application "System Events" to keystroke "," using {shift down, option down, control down} else if q is "decrease" then tell application "System Events" to keystroke "." using {shift down, option down, control down} else if q is "ccw" then tell application "System Events" to key code 123 using {shift down, option down, control down} else if q is "cw" then tell application "System Events" to key code 124 using {shift down, option down, control down} else if q is "force" then tell application "System Events" to keystroke "z" using {shift down, option down, control down} else if q is "float" then tell application "System Events" to keystroke "t" using {shift down, option down, control down} else if q is "main" then delay 0.1 tell application "System Events" to key code 36 using {shift down, option down, control down} end if end alfred_script
